title: Kevin, Dr Jim, Jarrod, Robert, and Julian Talk Kierkegaard, Apologetics, & Rule 7
description:
Dr Jim, his son Kevin, Robert Va, Jarrod, and Julian explore the effectiveness of apologetics, Christian use of power, the impersonal essence of objective knowledge, and the place of patience in faith.

Esther's blog w/ Jarrod's commentts:
https://www.patheos.com/blogs/youngfogey/2019/03/has-christian-apologetics-failed/

Julian's blog:
https://coffeewithkierkgaard.home.blog/2019/12/28/a-theology-of-weakness/

Kevin's band:
https://youtu.be/lf1Nw1RX
